EmailTemplate.name: Complaints Case Closure
EmailTemplate.subject: Case Closed : {!Case.CaseNumber} {!Case.Thread_Id}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Email_Sender_Name__c}
Once again, we thank you for raising your concern with us and allowing us the opportunity to investigate and resolve your complaint ref number: #{!Case.CaseNumber}
You would have been contacted by one of our staff to advise you of the outcome of the complaint.
We trust that you are satisfied with the outcome and the level of service we have provided you.
Should you have any further queries please do not hesitate to contact us.
Yours sincerely
Complaints Team
